programme.title: Ainda Me Chamam Campo Santo, (1971, Western)
programme.desc: Os irmãos McIntire tiveram uma educação primorosa na Inglaterra, graças às riquezas que a fazenda de seu velho pai proporcionou.

programme.title: O Grande Búfalo Branco, (1977, Western)
programme.desc: Em setembro de 1874 Wild Bill Hickok vai para o Velho Oeste, usando o nome de James Otis, pois precisa caçar um búfalo branco que sempre lhe provoca estranhos pesadelos.

programme.title: O Último Pôr do Sol, (1961, Western)
programme.desc: Belle Breckenridge e John Becheridge estão se preparando para uma jornada com o gado até o Texas, até que chega a casa deles o caubói Brendan O'Malley.

programme.title: Virtude Selvagem, (1946, Western)
programme.desc: Jody Baxter, um garoto solitário que faria qualquer coisa para ter um novo amigo, decidiu fazer um pedido ousado aos seus pais: ter um filhote de cervo como animal de estimação na fazenda em que moram.

programme.title: A Pistola é Minha Bíblia, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Após um violento assalto a uma diligência, com muitos tiros e ação explosiva, dois pistoleiros Tim e Larry, aparecem do nada, sem nenhuma informação sobre seu passado.

programme.title: A Pistola do Mal, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Gunfighter Lorn Warfield volta para casa após uma ausência de três anos. Lorn encontra seu rancho em ruínas. Seu vizinho, Owen Forbes, informa Lorn que seu rancho foi invadido pelos apaches que sequestraram sua esposa e dois filhos.

programme.title: Renegado Impiedoso, (1972, Western)
programme.desc: Pardon Chato é um índio Apache mestiço que vive na linha entre duas culturas, balanceando a sua tribo com o encantamento que tem pelo mundo dos brancos.

programme.title: A Marca da Forca, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Eles o cravaram de balas. Eles o penduraram pelo pescoço. Eles o deixaram para morrer. Mas eles cometeram dois erros fatais: eles tentaram enforcar o homem errado, e não terminaram o trabalho.

programme.title: Meu Nome é Ninguém, (1975, Western)
programme.desc: O honesto advogado Black Jack Gideon envolve-se na procura de um valioso e raro pônei japonês, que foi sequestrado, e por quem o bando de desertores renegados exige uma fabulosa quantia de resgate.

programme.title: Acima Da Lei, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Uma mulher pede a seu ex-marido, um advogado renomado, que defenda seu irmão criminoso, acusado de matar um promotor público.

programme.title: Legado de Violência, (2020, Thriller)
programme.desc: Quando seu filho envolvido com negócios perigosos e pessoas de mau caráter foge, um pai se vê em meio a uma crise pessoal e familiar.

programme.title: Projeto Pé Grande, (2021, Comedy)
programme.desc: Um grupo de cineastas amadores decide embarcar em uma jornada nas florestas da Geórgia à procura do misterioso Pé Grande.

programme.title: Por amor ou por dinheiro, (2019, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Um romance de conto de fadas toma um rumo inesperado quando Mark descobre que sua bela noiva, Connie, está planejando roubá-lo. Para não ser tolo, Mark embarca em uma missão para ver até onde Connie irá roubar seu dinheiro.

programme.title: O Muro, (2020, Drama)
programme.desc: Filmado durante 10 dias em um local ativo de travessia a 30 milhas ao norte da fronteira mexicana, O Muro é a história de uma amizade incomum entre uma imigrante sem documentos.

programme.title: Uma Última Vez, (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: Dylan Derringer é um dentista solitário na Flórida. Quando confrontado por uma figura do passado trazendo notícias, ele precisa embarcar em uma jornada de descobertas fantásticas e também desesperadoras, que vai mudar sua vida para sempre.

programme.title: Interligados, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Um homem, que se culpa pela morte da sua filha única, retorna à cidade onde o fatídico acidente ocorreu. Lá, ele conhece uma bela e misteriosa mulher. Ambos sentem-se atraídos um pelo outro, mas ela também carrega um passado sombrio.

programme.title: Eden, (2021, Drama)
programme.desc: Éva é alérgica a todos os tipos de substâncias químicas, poluição do ar, ondas de rádio e campos eletrônicos, assim vivendo em total isolamento do mundo externo, tendo contato apenas com seu irmão e os médicos.

programme.title: Assassinos de Aluguel, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Inspirado na história real de um escândalo que envolveu presidiários sendo liberados por um dia para trabalharem como assassinos de aluguel para políticos corruptos.

programme.title: O Muro, (2020, Drama)
programme.desc: Filmado durante 10 dias em um local ativo de travessia a 30 milhas ao norte da fronteira mexicana, O Muro é a história de uma amizade incomum entre uma imigrante sem documentos.

programme.title: Busca de Vingança, (2015, Thriller)
programme.desc: Baseado em um conto clássico de Edgar Allan Poe, este filme desafia a percepção da realidade. Busca de Vingança nos mostra como Edgar torna se uma força de terror contra qualquer um que está entre ele e seu desejo de vingança.

programme.title: A Ilha dos Tubarões, (2012, Creature Features)
programme.desc: Um grupo de completos estranhos se vê isolado por um louco rico em seu complexo na ilha. Eles são forçados a uma luva horripilante, onde devem sobreviver a uma barragem de espécies cada vez mais mortais de tubarão.

programme.title: Mega Python vs. Gatoroid, (2011, Creature Features)
programme.desc: Depois que uma espécie de píton gigante invade os pântanos, os guardas florestais criam jacarés mutantes para combater a ameaça. Logo, a batalha entre enormes pítons e enormes jacarés ameaça toda a Flórida.

programme.title: Forças do Mal, (2007, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: Cinco histórias macabras giram em torno de um controle remoto, um rádio estranho, uma garota de programa assassina (Camille Lacey), um noivado e um fantasma.

programme.title: Carnivore: Um Lobisomem de Londres, (2017, Werewolves)
programme.desc: Enquanto tentam reacender seu relacionamento em uma casa de campo remota, Dave e Abi são perseguidos por um segredo aterrorizante

programme.title: O Palhaço, (2019, Creature Features)
programme.desc: Depois de comprar uma boneca, a vida de Lane piora quando amigos próximos e familiares começam a desaparecer.

programme.title: Apocalipse Zumbi, (2011, Zombies)
programme.desc: Meses depois que uma praga de zumbis exterminou 90% da população americana, um pequeno grupo de sobreviventes abre caminho pelo país em busca de um refúgio na ilha de Catalina.

programme.title: O feitiço da Casa Whaley, (2012, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Quando um guia de turismo invade a Casa Mais Assombrada dos Estados Unidos, um pouco de caça aos fantasmas amadores com amigos se transforma em mais horror do que eles jamais poderiam imaginar.

programme.title: Necrotério, (2006, Zombies)
programme.desc: Uma brincadeira de estudantes universitários se torna mortal quando descobrem que um diretor de funerária pode ter sido libertado de um manicômio um pouco cedo demais.

programme.title: Batalha dos Zumbis, (2019, Zombies)
programme.desc: Alguns anos depois do caos econômico na Croácia, o mundo mudou e agora a água é rara e valiosa, e uma epidemia zumbi assola a Europa. O bon vivant Mico finalmente conhece sua estrela de cinema favorita, mas eles terão que lutar juntos para sobreviver.

programme.title: Em uma certa aldeia, Inuyasha e sua equipe estão cercados por aldeões que não gostam de Mirok. Quando eles perguntam por que, eles dizem que Mirok tem feito muitas más ações. Mirok diz que ele é inocente, e suspeita que isso seja obra de um impostor...
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e sua equipe se encontram com Izumo, que está investigando o segredo da criação da Jóia. Eles ouvem que um youkai apareceu e vão investigar uma aldeia próxima.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Os Criadores da Jóia de Quatro Almas: Parte 1

programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Os Criadores da Jóia de Quatro Almas: Parte 2

programme.title: Os insetos venenosos de Narak aparecem. Sesshomaru vai atrás deles. Enquanto isso, Jaken é picado por um inseto venenoso e está morrendo. Rin fica com ele e tenta salvá-lo. Ela vai ao campo de Jinenji para obter um fruto do Sennenso.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Kirara desaparece e Sango está preocupada. Shippo deduz as razões de Kirara para desaparecer e culpa Inuyasha. Naquele momento, um som estrondoso vem da floresta.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Agome é atraída para uma caverna por uma voz pedindo ajuda. Ao entrar ela encontra Kikyo, que não tem almas suficientes e enfraqueceu-se.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Kikyo e Kagome Sozinhas Numa Caverna

programme.title: Ginta e Hakkaku brigam com Kuga e acabam trabalhando separadamente. Ao fazer isso, eles encontram o grupo de Sesshomaru.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Kuga e Sesshomaru, O Perigoso Confronto

programme.title: Garamaru, um youkai mariposa, prendeu Agome e os outros em um casulo e agora eles estão presos em seus pesadelos. Na vida real, Inuyasha está lutando sozinho.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Pesadelo Real! A Luta na Floresta do Desespero

programme.title: A neve está caindo fora de época. Mirok é sequestrado por Koyuki, uma mulher misteriosa. Agome e os outros ouvem de um caçador e sua esposa sobre um youkai da neve. Quando eles vão procurá-lo, eles encontram Sango, que se perdeu.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Sete Anos Depois; As Neves Eternas

programme.title: Um ogro gigante chamado Kyokotsu aparece nas montanhas ao norte e devora outros youkais como a tribo de lobos.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Os Youkais Lobos são Atacados por um Zumbi

programme.title: O Exército dos Sete foi trazido de volta à vida. O calvário enviado para derrotá-los é dizimado pelo segundo mais forte, Yakotsu.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: A luta entre Yakotsu e Inuyasha é interrompida quando Mukotsu interfere. Mukotsu sequestra Agome para torná-la sua noiva. Mirok e Sango tentam salvá-la, mas o veneno de Mukotsu os impede de se mover.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Agome, Mirok e Sango foram enfraquecidos pelo veneno de Mukotsu. Inuyasha tenta os ajudar.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: No templo, Inuyasha verifica se Agome e os outros estão seguros. Ele acaba confiando em Renkotsu e Ginkotsu o bombardeia. Inuyasha os enfrenta, mas Renkotsu rouba os fragmentos.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Agome, Mirok e Sango pararam de respirar. Inuyasha procura pelo Exército dos Sete para vingá-los. Ele vê Sesshomaru e se certifica de que é uma ilusão.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e seu grupo se aproximam da luz de um fragmento da Jóia que parece pertencer ao Exército, mas a luz não emana energia maligna. Suikotsu, um bom médico é o dono do fragmento...
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: A personalidade má de Suikotsu desperta e luta contra Inuyasha. Quando as crianças o chamam para voltar a ser quem ele era, Suikotsu sente uma forte dor. Bankotsu decidiu retirar-se da vila.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Há uma barreira ao redor do Monte Hakurei que purifica os youkais ou qualquer coisa maligna. Inuyasha e os outros pensam que Narak não pode estar se escondendo no Monte e vão procurar uma pista diferente.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Líder do Exército dos Sete! Bankotsu Entra em Cena

programme.title: A batalha entre Bankotsu e Inuyasha começa. Enquanto isso, Sesshomaru chega ao Monte Hakurei.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Há uma ilha sagrada em um lago cercado por névoa. Hakushin, que se tornou um Buda vivo há cem anos, é venerado lá. Mas algo estranho acontece. O pai de um garoto chamado Shintaro vai investigar, mas ele não volta.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Barreira Energética da Ilha Hijiri

programme.title: Bankotsu sequestra Agome e os outros envolvidos em sua batalha contra Inuyasha. Inuyasha está fica irritado por ver que seus amigos estão se machucando.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Topo Sagrado e o Segredo da Múmia

programme.title: A barreira sagrada de Monte Hakurei impede que os youkais entrem nele. Hakushin ajuda Narak e coloca a barreira.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Monte Hakurei fica mais forte, e Kikyo é impedida de entrar em seu solo sagrado. Kikyo deixa a aldeia de Chiyo, mas vai atrás do Bankotsu para ver o que o Exército dos Sete está fazendo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Suikotsu não pode matar Chiyo e os outros. Após isso, Suikotsu e Jakotsu vão para dentro do local sagrado e esperam por Sesshomaru.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Ginkotsu morre e Renkotsu usa seu fragmento sem permissão. Ao fazê-lo, ele traiu Bankotsu. Ele deseja ainda mais poder e ataca Kuga para que ele possa pegar os fragmentos da Jóia.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: O mal dentro do Monte Hakurei são os youkais de Narak. Mirok arrisca sua vida para salvar Sango e suga todos os youkais com seu ataque junto com os insetos venenosos e entra em colapso.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Mirok e Sango ficam cara a cara com a múmia de Hakushin no Monte Hakurei. O santo diz a eles o motivo de ajudar Narak.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha recupera seus poderes, derrota Jakotsu e se apressa para o Monte Hakurei. Renkotsu tem sentimentos rebeldes em relação ao Bankotsu.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: A barreira do Monte Hakurei desaparece e Inuyasha está preocupado com a Agome, que vai para o Monte com Kuga e os outros. Enquanto isso, Kikyo e Sesshomaru sentiram que algo estranho aconteceu em diferentes locais.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Batalha Decisiva! O Último e Mais Forte dos Guerreiros Zumbis

programme.title: Mirok e Sango veem um misterioso pedaço de carne nas profundezas do Monte Hakurei. Sesshomaru e Kikyo sentem algo estranho acontecendo em diferentes locais e seguem para o Monte Hakurei.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Poderosa Banryu; Duelo Mortal no Monte Hakurei

programme.title: Narak ganhou um novo corpo e renasceu. Inuyasha tenta derrotá-lo com seu ataque, mas ele se defende e fere Agome, Mirok e os outros. Enquanto isso, Kikyo vê Kagura escapando do Monte Hakurei.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: O Monte Hakurei é destruído e Kuga acaba caindo, mas Inuyasha o salva. Quando ele se encontra com Agome e os outros, que estão tentando escapar o mais rápido possível, ele vê uma ilusão de Kikyo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha é afastado de seus amigos quando é enganado por informações falsas de que Kikyo ainda está viva. Enquanto isso, Agome e os outros estão em uma certa cidade do castelo e são capturados.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Escuridão do Coração de Agome

programme.title: Koichi e Rohan encontram algo estranho em um beco não identificado no mapa da cidade. Pressentindo ainda mais confusão, Rohan acha que é o ataque de um Stand.

programme.title: Josuke e Okuyasu veem pequenos Stands pegando moedas na rua. Eles vão atrás deles e conhecem um garoto chamado Shigechi. Josuke tem uma ideia.

programme.title: Josuke, Okuyasu e Shigechi vão ao banco receber o prêmio da loteria. Lá, o banqueiro faz de tudo para provar que o bilhete premiado não é deles e Josuke entra em ação.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.sub-title: Yoshikage Kira quer uma vida tranquila – Parte 2

programme.title: Josuke e Jotaro vasculham a casa onde Kira vivia e descobrem uma coleção esquisita. Uma câmera Polaroid em uma mesa tira uma foto deles.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Yoshihiro Kira procura usuários de Stand para ajudá-lo a proteger o filho. Um rapaz pede a Rohan, que está perseguindo Kira, para jogar pedra, papel ou tesoura.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O pivete do Janken vem aí!

programme.title: Rohan suspeita que Josuke está trapaceando nos dados e aposta que consegue descobrir como. Se Rohan ganhar a próxima rodada, Josuke perderá um dedo mindinho.

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Rohan fica em apuros depois de ver as costas de Kinoto. Um jovem surge diante de Josuke com um papel dobrado que esconde algo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Rohan não pode expor as costas e pede ajuda a Koichi, que não acredita nele. Apesar do risco que corre, Rohan vai ao hotel de Jotaro.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kawajiri finalmente acaba com Hayato. Depois de saberem o que houve com Hayato, Rohan e os outros vão verificar a casa de Kawajiri.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Hayato percebe que todos os que ficam sabendo de Yoshikage Kira através dele morrem e que, depois disso, a mesma manhã se repete.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kira pretende remover o terceiro poder, Bites The Dust, porque Hayato matou várias pessoas e voltou à mesma manhã. Mas alguém surge diante de Kira.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Uma bomba de ar invade a casa onde Josuke e Hayato estão escondidos. Nenhum dos dois sabe como a bomba conseguiu detectá-los.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Mesmo encurralado, Kira não desiste. Ele usa o Bites The Dust em uma socorrista e tenta explodir o tempo ativando o detonador pelo Deadly Queen.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Adeus, Morioh – O coração de ouro

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Bucciarati entrega as joias de Polpo ao Chefe, Pericolo, e é promovido a caporegime da Passione.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Durante uma operação, Narancia é interceptado por Formaggio, membro do Time de Assassinos, que encolhe o capanga usando os poderes de Tiny Feet.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O Garoto Formiga 3, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: A Exofarm tem um novo CEO e quer controlar o mundo. Antboy, um menino de 12 anos, Pelle, que é mordido por uma formiga e desenvolve superpoderes, tenta impedi-la.

programme.title: Pequenos Espiões 4, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: Marisa Cortez Wilson é casada com Wilbur, um repórter conhecido por desmascarar espiões, e com ele tem um bebê e duas crianças. O que o marido não sabe é que a esposa é uma ex-espiã, que decidiu largar a carreira para se dedicar à família.

programme.title: Arthur & Merlin: Cavaleiros de Camelot, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Um Rei Arthur muito mais velho retorna para casa após lutar contra o Império Romano. Seu filho ilegítimo corrompeu o trono de Camelot. Agora o Rei Arthur deve se reunir com o mago Merlin e os Cavaleiros da Távola Redonda e lutar para recuperar sua coroa.

programme.title: Meu “Querido” Elfo, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: Uma mãe solteira compra um apartamento antigo, sem saber que uma criatura mítica – um elfo doméstico – vive no apartamento há séculos. Os novos donos da casa precisarão fazer amizade com o elfo, cuja tarefa é justamente proteger o local de uma bruxa.

programme.title: Expedição Kon-Tiki, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Em 1947, apesar do medo da água e da incapacidade de nadar, Heyerdahl decidiu testar sua teoria. Ele e cinco companheiros navegam do Peru em uma jangada de madeira construída com um design antigo.

programme.title: O Rei Da Montanha, (2022, Drama)
programme.desc: Nesta aventura da mitologia nórdica, Espen 'Ash Lad' embarca, junto a seus irmãos, em uma perigosa missão para resgatar a princesa de um vilão conhecido como o Rei da Montanha — com o intuito de ganhar a recompensa e salvar sua família da ruína.

programme.title: O Menino e o Urso, (2014, Drama)
programme.desc: Nos campos gelados do norte do Canadá do norte, Luke descobre que um filhote de urso polar jovem foi separado de sua mãe e tenta encontrar uma maneira de reunir os dois.

programme.title: Um Garoto no Palácio de Aladim, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Calvin, um jovem entregador de pizza, é confundido com o "Grande Libertador" por um gênio, que o atrai de volta ao século VIII, onde deve unir forças com Ali Babá para salvar toda a Arábia do irmão maligno de Aladim, Luxor.

programme.title: Mee-Shee: O Gigante das Aguas, (2007, Action)
programme.desc: A viagem para Disney foi cancelada. Mac e seu pai, Sean, vão a uma cidade com um lago. Eles encontrarão aventuras emocionantes que superam a Disney, com perseguições e bandidos. Uma história de amizade para toda a família.

programme.title: O Caçador de Dragões, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: Depois que o pai de Will é morto por um dragão, ele embarca em uma jornada épica para se vingar do monstro .

programme.title: O Justiceiro, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: Um policial problemático disfarçado deve se infiltrar em uma gangue implacável. Mas as coisas azedam quando outro policial revela seu disfarce e ele rapidamente se vê lutando por sua vida e pela vida de sua família.

programme.title: Cão de briga, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: Criado por um mafioso (Hoskins) como um animal para ser uma máquina de matar, (Jet Li) é campeão de lutas clandestinas que ajuda pianista cego (Freeman) perseguido por criminosos.

programme.title: A Hora do Acerto, (2004, Action)
programme.desc: Para a Gangue dos 5, tudo é um videogame: matar policiais, armar emboscadas e criar requintes de crueldade. Quem se torna vítima de suas armadilhas é o inspetor de polícia Wing e todo o seu time de policiais, que são brutalmente assassinados.

programme.title: Vale da Luta, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Depois que a jovem Tori é encontrada morta, sua irmã Windsor inicia uma investigação por conta própria e descobre que ela lutava para pagar suas despesas.

programme.title: Três Ladrões e Um Bebê, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: Para o compulsivo jogador de Slipper (Jackie Chan), existe apenas uma coisa mais aterrorizante do que os credores - o som do choro de um bebê. Mas e se um bebê se transforma-se no salvador de suas dívidas?

programme.title: O Legado Do Grande Mestre, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Mantendo-se discreto depois de ter sido derrotado por Ip Man, Cheung Tin Chi mete-se em sarilhos depois de se envolver numa luta com um estrangeiro poderoso.

programme.title: O Monge à Prova de Balas, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma história em quadrinhos "underground", ele conta a história de um monge tibetano imortal -Chow- que se torna o mentor de um jovem menino de rua -Scott-, a quem ele ensina a proteger um velho pergaminho que o monge cuidou durante anos.

programme.title: O Matador - Missão Resgate, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Quando a garota de quem ele está cuidando é sequestrada, um assassino aposentado rapidamente recupera seus instintos assassinos, incendiando a cidade.

programme.title: A Hora do Acerto, (2004, Action)
programme.desc: Para a Gangue dos 5, tudo é um videogame: matar policiais, armar emboscadas e criar requintes de crueldade. Quem se torna vítima de suas armadilhas é o inspetor de polícia Wing e todo o seu time de policiais, que são brutalmente assassinados.

programme.title: The Angel Levine, (1970, Comedy)
programme.desc: A sentimental tale of an elderly Jewish tailor (Zero Mostel) who has lost his faith in God and himself. Enter a Jewish angel (Harry Belafonte), on probation, who must earn his wings by convincing the tailor that life does have meaning.

programme.title: Battle of Britain, (1969, War)
programme.desc: A stellar cast, including Michael Caine, Laurence Olivier and Christopher Plummer highlights this epic telling of the greatest air battle in history, when the outnumbered Royal Air Force defeated the German Luftwaffe, saving England from invasion.

programme.title: The Fugitive Kind, (1960, Drama)
programme.desc: In this Tennessee Williams masterpiece, Marlon Brando is superb as a paradoxical drifter drawn into the desperate lives of two passionate women, Maureen Stapleton and Joanne Woodward, in a small Mississippi town.

programme.title: The Barefoot Contessa, (1954, Romance)
programme.desc: A waning director revives his career after discovering a beautiful Spanish dancer and makes her into a Hollywood star. Ava Gardner, Humphrey Bogart and Edmond O’Brien star in this bitter tale of stardom won and wasted from Joseph L. Mankiewicz.

programme.title: Moby Dick, (1956, Action)
programme.desc: This stellar retelling of Melville's classic is unsurpassed in entertainment, imagination and high adventure. Consumed by an insane rage, Captain Ahab (Gregory Peck) has but one purpose in life - revenge on the great white whale who disfigured him.

programme.title: Roman Holiday, (1953, Romance)
programme.desc: Audrey Hepburn's portrayal of a modern-day princess, rebelling against the royal obligations, who explores Rome on her own. This romantic comedy ranks as one of the most enjoyable films of all times.

programme.title: Sabrina, (1954, Romance)
programme.desc: Bogie and Holden are the mega-rich Larrabee brothers of Long Island. Bogie’s all work, Holden’s all playboy. But when Sabrina (Hepburn), daughter of the family’s chauffeur, returns from Paris, the stage is set for some family fireworks.

programme.title: The Patriot, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: In 1776 South Carolina, widower and legendary war hero Benjamin Martin (Mel Gibson) finds himself thrust into the midst of the American Revolutionary War as he helplessly watches his family torn apart by the savage forces of the British Redcoats.

programme.title: Get the Gringo, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: A career criminal nabbed by Mexican authorities is placed in a tough prison, where he learns to survive with the help of a young boy.

programme.title: Armored, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: A crew of officers at an armored transport security firm embark on the ultimate heist – against their own company. The seemingly fool-proof plan soon proves to be useless when an unexpected witness interferes, as the plan quickly unravels.

programme.title: Jack Reacher, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: Investigator Jack Reacher leaps off the pages of Lee Child's novel and onto the big screen in this thriller. When a horrible crime is committed, all evidence points to the suspect in custody, who offers up a single note in defense: "Get Jack Reacher!"

programme.title: Accident Man, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Mike is a tough hitman, who makes his hits look like accidents or suicide. He's in a gang of hitmen, each with his own style. When his loved ex is killed, Mike looks for those responsible.

programme.title: Accident Man: Hitman's Holiday, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: A hit man must beat the top assassins in the world.

programme.title: Jack Reacher, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: Investigator Jack Reacher leaps off the pages of Lee Child's novel and onto the big screen in this thriller. When a horrible crime is committed, all evidence points to the suspect in custody, who offers up a single note in defense: "Get Jack Reacher!"

programme.title: The Professional, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: The mysterious Leon (Jean Reno) is New York's top hitman. When his next-door neighbors are murdered, Leon becomes the unwilling guardian of the family's sole survivor - 12-year-old Mathilda (Natalie Portman). Rating:R

programme.title: A Message from Brianna, (2021, Satanic Stories)
programme.desc: A Message from Brianna

programme.title: Disturbing Behavior, (1998, Thriller)
programme.desc: When the Clark Family moves from Chicago to Cradle Bay, Steve is cautioned by Gavin Strick about the separating factions at the local high school, where the Blue Ribbons, a club of robotic perfect students, rule.

programme.title: Flatliners, (1990, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Are you afraid to die? Kiefer Sutherland isn't. He's an ambitious, charismatic medical student who persuades classmates Julia Roberts and Kevin Bacon to take part in a reckless experiment. Rated: R

programme.title: The Dead Zone, (1983, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A man awakens from a coma to discover he has a psychic detective ability.

programme.title: Christine, (1983, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Based on the novel by Stephen King, CHRISTINE tells the story of a 1957 Plymouth that takes on human characteristics.

programme.title: Maximum Overdrive, (1986, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: After a mysterious comet turns every machine on Earth into a homicidal rampage device, the survivors at the Dixie Boy Truck Stop are making a stand, and human vengeance goes into overdrive.

programme.title: Pet Sematary, (1989, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: For most families, moving is a new beginning. But for the Creeds, it could be the beginning of the end. Because they've just moved in next door to a place that children built with broken dreams, the Pet Sematary.

programme.title: Stephen King's Sometimes They Come Back, (1991, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: A high school teacher (Tim Matheson) faces the demon ghosts of a gang of former students. Brooke Adams, Robert Hy Gorman, Robert Rusler, Nicholas Sadler, and William Sanderson also star. Based on a short story by Stephen King.

programme.title: The Dark Half, (1993, Thriller)
programme.desc: A writer undergoes an operation that reveals a twin in his brain. He begins a double writing life, using a pseudonym for his disreputable best-sellers. When the pseudonym discovers he is to be eradicated, he goes on a murderous rampage.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Inside a shadowy St. Moritz hotel, danger leaves Joseph and Lisa Lisa no time to mourn as they follow a bloody trail to Wamuu and Kars. Luckily, Lisa Lisa manages to strike a deal—but, of course, with one condition.

programme.title: City Hunter
programme.desc: Oohara Midori got her swimsuit designs stolen by her declining mentor.
programme.sub-title: Summer's Lovely Designer: Ryo has a Thing for the Super-High-Leg Type

programme.title: The Fighting Temptations, (2003, Musical)
programme.desc: To collect his aunt's inheritance, an unemployed man (Cuba Gooding Jr.) must form a gospel choir and lead it to success.

programme.title: Jimi: All Is By My Side, (2013, Drama)
programme.desc: A drama based on Jimi Hendrix's life as he left New York City for London, where his career took off.

programme.title: Dreamgirls, (2006, Musical)
programme.desc: With showstopping performances by a star-studded cast, Dreamgirls soars with the amazing story of three female singers who learn that anything is possible when you hold on to your dreams.

programme.title: The Fighting Temptations, (2003, Musical)
programme.desc: To collect his aunt's inheritance, an unemployed man (Cuba Gooding Jr.) must form a gospel choir and lead it to success.

programme.title: Four Brothers, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: After their adoptive mother is murdered during a grocery store hold-up, the Mercer bros reunite to take the matter into their own hands. As they track down the killer, they quickly realize that their old ways of doing business have new consequences.

programme.title: Paid in Full, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: A young man from Harlem, forced to cope with the 1980s drug scene, builds an illegal empire, only to have a crisis of conscience. Featuring the hit soundtrack with songs by Eric B. & Rakim, Boogie Down Productions, Guy, and Jay-Z.

programme.title: The King of Fighters, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: The surviving descendants of three legendary clans are transported to other dimensions to test their martial arts skills against an evil force that seeks to invade and overrun the world as we know it.

programme.title: Universal Soldier: The Return, (1999, Action)
programme.desc: The "universal soldiers" must fight the whole army, when the military's supercomputer S.E.T.H gets out of control.

programme.title: Accident Man, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Mike is a tough hitman, who makes his hits look like accidents or suicide. He's in a gang of hitmen, each with his own style. When his loved ex is killed, Mike looks for those responsible.

programme.title: Accident Man: Hitman's Holiday, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: A hit man must beat the top assassins in the world.

programme.title: Tekken, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: The year is 2039. The world wars have destroyed everything and territories are run by corporations, the mightiest of which is TEKKEN. In the midst of the ruined society, one warrior rises from the streets.

programme.title: Tekken: Kazuya's Revenge, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: A defenseless man is kidnapped by an organized crime syndicate and turned into a ruthless assassin.

programme.title: DOA: Dead or Alive, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: The world's best fighters are invited to DOA, a martial-arts tournament. Four female rival fighters, an aristocratic warrior, a wrestling superstar, an athlete with a tragic past, and an assassin-for-hire, work together to uncover a secret.

programme.title: Lady Bloodfight, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Upon arriving in Hong Kong, an American woman is beaten up and mugged by thugs. She's taken in by a martial arts master who trains her for a formidable fight competition known as the Kumite.

programme.title: Clash, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: Trinh, a mercenary, must complete a series of organized crime jobs for her boss in order to win the release of her kidnapped daughter.

programme.title: Furie, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: When a little girl is kidnapped by a trafficking ring, they soon find they messed with the wrong child. Her mother, a notorious former gang leader, is close on their trail and will go to any lengths to bring her daughter home.

programme.title: Mean Girls, (2004, Screwball)
programme.desc: Cady thinks she understands "survival of the fittest." However, the law of the wild takes a whole new meaning when the homeschooled 15-year-old enters public high school for the first time.

programme.title: The First Wives Club, (1996, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Join the Club - The First Wives Club, the good-time battle-of-the-sexes satire sparked by snappy one-liners, great physical-comedy gags and three unforgettable stars in top form, Bette Midler, Goldie Hawn and Diane Keaton.

programme.title: Heartbreakers, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: Max and Page are a mother/daughter con team. Max targets wealthy men and marries them. Page then seduces them while Max "catches" her wayward husbands in the act. Then on to the next mark, posing in a variety of guises to keep one step ahead of the law.

programme.title: Eurotrip, (2004, Screwball)
programme.desc: Europe will never be the same again after Scotty Thomas and his buddies take off for the express to excess! They're hooking up with hot strangers and jamming all the extreme insanity they can into the wildest trip of their lives!

programme.title: Bill & Ted's Excellent Adventure, (1989, Screwball)
programme.desc: Our non-heinous heroes Bill (Alex Winter) and Ted (Keanu Reeves) are in danger of flunking history! But when the righteous Rufus (George Carlin) arrives in a time-travelling phone booth, the dense dudes discover their destiny!

programme.title: Bill & Ted's Bogus Journey, (1991, Screwball)
programme.desc: In this sequel to BILL & TED'S EXCELLENT ADVENTURE, the dimwitted duo travel to Heaven, Hell and points in between as they meet (among others) Albert Einstein, the Easter Bunny and the Grim Reaper.

programme.title: High School High, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: From the creators of the Naked Gun series comes High School High. Richard C. Clark is an idealisticyoung teacher who leaves a position at a prestigious school headed by his own father to teach at Marion Barry High.

programme.title: Mean Girls, (2004, Screwball)

programme.title: Shakespeare In Love, (1998, Drama)

programme.title: Titanic, (1997, Drama)
programme.desc: Leonardo DiCaprio and Oscar-nominee Kate Winslet light up the screen as Jack and Rose, the young lovers who find one another on the maiden voyage of the "unsinkable" R.M.S. Titanic.

programme.title: Return to Me, (2000, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A man who falls in love with the woman who received his wife's heart must decide which woman it is who holds his heart.

programme.title: Shakespeare In Love, (1998, Drama)
programme.desc: After providing inspiration to Will Shakespeare, his case of writer's block cured, and a taste for romance rekindled by the mysterious Lady Viola. Gwyneth Paltrow, Joseph Fiennes, Ben Affleck, and Dame Judi Dench star in this Best Picture winner.

programme.title: Breakin' All the Rules, (2004, Comedy)
programme.desc: Inspired by his fiancée (who dumped him), a man publishes a break-up hand-book for men, becoming a best-selling author in the process.

programme.title: Just Like Heaven, (2005, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: He's convinced she's a spirit. She's convinced she's still alive. As they search for the truth of Elizabeth's past, their relationship changes from resentment to romance.

programme.title: What Women Want, (2000, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: After an accident, a chauvinistic executive gains the ability to hear what women are really thinking.

programme.title: Jack Ryan: Shadow Recruit, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: Jack Ryan must quickly evolve from soldier to analyst to full-fledged operative to stop a devastating terrorist plot against the United States.

programme.title: No Country For Old Men, (2007, Drama)
programme.desc: Winner of four Academy Awards, including Best Picture, filmmakers Joel and Ethan Coen (FARGO) bring to the screen a thrilling bestseller in which a crime-scene's irresistible stolen loot sets forth an unstoppable chain reaction of violence.

programme.title: The Usual Suspects, (1995, Thriller)
programme.desc: A gruesome scene adorns a pier in San Pedro, south of Los Angeles. Twenty-seven dead bodies. A burned-out ship smoldering in the harbor.

programme.title: Jagged Edge, (1985, Thriller)
programme.desc: A grisly homicide, a sensational trial, a forbidden affair it's JAGGED EDGE, a razor-sharp suspense thriller about crime, punishment and passion. Jeff Bridges is the prime suspect and Glenn Close plays the attorney who falls in love with him. rated -R

programme.title: Tears of the Sun, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: After a West African president's family is assassinated and civil unrest is rampant, a top-secret team is deployed to the far reaches of the jungle to rescue a U.S. doctor who is acting as a missionary.

programme.title: No Country For Old Men, (2007, Drama)

programme.title: The Sum of All Fears, (2002, Thriller)

programme.title: Red Eye, (2005, Thriller)
programme.desc: Moments after takeoff, Lisa's seatmate, Jackson, menacingly reveals the real reason he's on board: He is an operative in a plot to kill a rich and powerful businessman .... And Lisa is the key to its success.

programme.title: Undisputed, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: When the world's heavyweight champion is sent to prison, everything points to an inevitable showdown with the penitentiary's undefeated champ. But to make sure the meeting will happen, a former mob boss must call in favors from the outside world.

programme.title: The Truman Show, (1998, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Truman doesn’t realize that his quaint hometown is a giant studio set run by a visionary producer/director/creator (Ed Harris), that folks living and working there are Hollywood actors, that even his incessantly bubbly wife is a contract player.

programme.title: Rachel Getting Married, (2008, Drama)
programme.desc: When Kym, returns to the Buchman family home for the wedding of her sister Rachel, she brings a long history of personal crises, family conflict, and tragedy along with her. Rated -R

programme.title: St. Elmo's Fire, (1985, Drama)
programme.desc: Seven friends, recent college graduates, are searching for a place in the real world, as they face issues of career and commitment. Rating: R

programme.title: Undisputed, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: When the world's heavyweight champion is sent to prison, everything points to an inevitable showdown with the penitentiary's undefeated champ. But to make sure the meeting will happen, a former mob boss must call in favors from the outside world.

programme.title: The Truman Show, (1998, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Truman doesn’t realize that his quaint hometown is a giant studio set run by a visionary producer/director/creator (Ed Harris), that folks living and working there are Hollywood actors, that even his incessantly bubbly wife is a contract player.

programme.title: The Wolf of Wall Street, (2013, Drama)
programme.desc: Sex. Money. Power. Drugs. Brace yourself for a true story from legendary filmmaker Martin Scorsese. Leonardo DiCaprio stars as a young stockbroker hungry for a life of non-stop thrills, where corruption was king and more was never enough.

programme.title: Almost Famous, (2000, Drama)
programme.desc: A high-school boy is given the chance to write a story for Rolling Stone Magazine about an up-and-coming rock band as he accompanies it on their concert tour.

programme.title: Grey Owl, (1999, Action)
programme.desc: The story of the life and work of the Canadian fur trapper-turned-conservationist who claimed to be an aboriginal North American.

programme.title: Posse, (1993, Western)
programme.desc: There's action galore in this off-beat western that features a group of mostly black infantrymen who return from the Spanish-American War with a cache of gold. The men travel to the West where their leader searches for the men who lynched his father.

programme.title: Sabata, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: Get ready for fast-paced, explosive action as Lee Van Cleef stars as Sabata, the mysterious, steely-eyed gunslinger who, after he discovers the masterminds behind an elaborate bank heist, imposes his bullet-laced brand of justice on a guilty town.

programme.title: A Fistful Of Dynamite, (1972, Western)
programme.desc: The results are explosive when an Irish terrorist (James Coburn) with a dynamite obsession teams up with a Mexican peasant-turned-revolutionary (Rod Steiger) in this action-packed tale of power and politics. Directed by the legendary Sergio Leone.

programme.title: Geronimo: An American Legend, (1993, Action)
programme.desc: An American legend comes to life in this epic Western starring Jason Patric, Robert Duvall, Gene Hackman and Wes Studi as Geronimo, giving a stunning performance as the fearless warrior who was the last Indian leader to surrender to the white man.

programme.title: Duel at Diablo, (1966, Western)
programme.desc: Frontier scout Jess Remsberg leads a wagon train through hostile territory to Fort Conchos. But underneath his valor, he has an ulterior motive: to settle a score with the man he believes killed his wife. James Garner and Sidney Poitier star.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: Yul Brynner stars as one of seven gunslingers pitted against an army of marauding bandits in this rousing classic that made stars of Steve McQueen, Charles Bronson, and James Coburn. Eli Wallach also stars in this timeless tale of good versus evil.

programme.title: Return of the Seven, (1966, Western)
programme.desc: Starring Yul Brynner and a stellar supporting cast that includes Robert Fuller, Warren Oates, and Claude Akins, this classic western adventure follows the legendary Magnificent Seven as they thunder through Mexico to face the shootout of their lives!

programme.title: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: The battle for Earth continues when college-bound Sam Witwicky learns the truth about the ancient origins of the Transformers and must join in their continued battle against the Decepticons.

programme.title: Transformers: Dark of the Moon, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: A mysterious event from Earth's past threatens to ignite a war so big that the Transformers alone will not be able to save the planet. Sam Witwicky and the Autobots must fight against the darkness to defend our world from the Decepticons.

programme.title: Transformers: Age of Extinction, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: From director Michael Bay comes the best 'Transformers' ever! With humanity facing extinction from a terrifying new threat, it's up to the Autobots to save Earth. They'll need new allies, including inventor Cade (Mark Wahlberg) and the Dinobots!

programme.title: Transformers, (2007, Action)
programme.desc: From director Michael Bay and executive producer Steven Spielberg comes a thrilling battle between the heroic Autobots and the evil Decepticons. When their epic struggle comes to Earth, Sam Witwicky becomes mankind's last chance for survival.

programme.title: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: The battle for Earth continues when college-bound Sam Witwicky learns the truth about the ancient origins of the Transformers and must join in their continued battle against the Decepticons.

programme.title: Transformers: Dark of the Moon, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: A mysterious event from Earth's past threatens to ignite a war so big that the Transformers alone will not be able to save the planet. Sam Witwicky and the Autobots must fight against the darkness to defend our world from the Decepticons.

programme.title: Layer Cake, (2004, Thriller)
programme.desc: Planning to retire and begin a new life, Mr. X (Daniel Craig, Lara Croft: Tomb Raider), a successful West End drug dealer, has been asked for one last favor: to negotiate the sale of one million hits of Ecstasy. Rated: R

programme.title: This Is Spinal Tap, (1984, Mockumentaries)
programme.desc: Undoubtedly the funniest film ever made about rock and roll, Rob Reiner's satire about an over-the-hill heavy metal band is a priceless look at the music business and it's madness.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: A World War II captain (Tom Hanks) and his squad (Edward Burns, Tom Sizemore) risk all to locate and send home a soldier whose three brothers died in combat.

programme.title: The Hunt for Red October, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: A new technologically-superior Soviet nuclear sub is heading for the U.S. coast; however, one CIA analyst thinks the captain will defect the submarine, and he only has hours to prove it.

programme.title: Empire of the Sun, (1987, Drama)
programme.desc: This epic drama chronicles J.G. Ballard's remarkable struggle to survive a childhood filled with betrayal, death and disappointment trapped in Shanghai during the World War II Japanese occupation.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: A World War II captain (Tom Hanks) and his squad (Edward Burns, Tom Sizemore) risk all to locate and send home a soldier whose three brothers died in combat.

programme.title: Good Will Hunting, (1997, Drama)
programme.desc: The hit Oscar-winning drama which launched the careers of Matt Damon and Ben Affleck tells the tale of a headstrong, working-class genius who's failing the lessons of life, until he meets a relatable psychology professor (Robin Williams).

programme.title: 24 Hour Party People, (2002, Comedy)
programme.desc: Graphically depicting the music and dance heritage of Manchester from the late 70s to the early 90s, the movie documents the vibrancy that made Manchester the place in the world that you would most like to be.

programme.title: Art School Confidential, (2006, Comedy)
programme.desc: A satirical look at the cult of celebrity in the story of a cop who goes undercover as an art student and gains critical acclaim for his work.

programme.title: Hundreds of Beavers, (2024, Comedy)
programme.desc: A drunken applejack salesman must go from zero to hero and become North America's greatest fur trapper by defeating Hundreds of Beavers.

programme.title: Clerks II, (2006, Screwball)
programme.desc: A calamity at Dante and Randall's shops sends them looking for new horizons, but they ultimately settle at Mooby's, a fictional Disney-McDonald's-style fast-food empire. Sequel to the 1994 film by Kevin Smith.

programme.title: Clerks III, (2022, Screwball)
programme.desc: Following a massive heart attack, Randal enlists his friends and fellow clerks Dante, Elias, Jay, and Silent Bob to make a movie immortalizing his life at the convenience store that started it all.

programme.title: Party Girl, (1995, Drama)
programme.desc: In this raucous comedy, Parker Posey ("Scream 3") stars as a hard-partying NY club girl who takes a job as a librarian.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction, (1987, Drama)
programme.desc: Michael Douglas plays Dan, a New York attorney who has a tryst with seductive Alex Forrest while his wife is away. Dan later shrugs off the affair as a mistake and considers it over. But Alex won't be ignored. Not now, not tomorrow, not ever.

programme.title: Thelma & Louise, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: In one of the greatest road movies of all time, Geena Davis and Susan Sarandon ride to everlasting fame as two women who embark on a crime spree across the American southwest.

programme.title: Winnie The Pooh: Blood and Honey, (2022, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: Winnie-The-Pooh: Blood and Honey follows Pooh and Piglet as they go on a rampage after Christopher Robin abandons them.

programme.title: The Town That Dreaded Sundown, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: 65 years after a masked serial killer terrorized the small town of Texarkana, the "moonlight murders" begin again. A lonely high school girl, with dark secrets of her own, may be the key to catching him.

programme.title: Spell, (2019, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Marquis (Omari Hardwick) awakens from a plane crash, wounded, trapped and his family missing. Held by a mysterious elderly woman practicing Hoodoo, he tries to outwit and break free from her dark magic and save his family from a sinister ritual.

programme.title: The Haunting In Connecticut, (2009, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: After a family is forced to relocate for their son's health, they begin experiencing supernatural behavior in their new home, which turns out to be a former mortuary and séance parlor.

programme.title: The Babadook, (2014, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: In this terrifying thriller, a mother must protect her son from an evil, supernatural entity that has escaped the pages of a children's book and is lurking in their home.

programme.title: Mom and Dad, (2018, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: A teenage girl and her little brother must survive a wild 24 hours during which a mass hysteria of unknown origins causes parents to turn violently on their own kids.

programme.title: Spell, (2019, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Marquis (Omari Hardwick) awakens from a plane crash, wounded, trapped and his family missing. Held by a mysterious elderly woman practicing Hoodoo, he tries to outwit and break free from her dark magic and save his family from a sinister ritual.

programme.title: The Ring, (2002, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: When four teenagers all meet with mysterious deaths exactly one week after watching a videotape, investigative reporter Rachel Keller tracks down the video... and watches it.

programme.title: The Running Man, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: A wrongly-convicted man must try to survive a public execution gauntlet staged as a TV game show.

programme.desc: A huge comet passes near the earth, vaporizing nearly the whole planet. But a few partially exposed people are now blood-thirsty zombies, and they begin a hunt for the remaining humans.

programme.title: Scrooged, (1988, Comedy)

programme.title: Paid in Full, (2002, Action)

programme.title: Witness, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: When a young Amish woman and her son get caught up in the murder of an undercover narcotic's agent, their saviour turns out to be hardened Philadelphia detective John Book.

programme.title: Revolver, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: REVOLVER is populated with Guy Ritchie's (Snatch; Lock, Stock & Two Smoking Barrels) classic breed of fast-talking, sharp-suited gangsters but with a psychological twist that your mind may not be able to handle.

programme.title: Layer Cake, (2004, Thriller)
programme.desc: Planning to retire and begin a new life, Mr. X (Daniel Craig, Lara Croft: Tomb Raider), a successful West End drug dealer, has been asked for one last favor: to negotiate the sale of one million hits of Ecstasy. Rated: R

programme.title: Paid in Full, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: A young man from Harlem, forced to cope with the 1980s drug scene, builds an illegal empire, only to have a crisis of conscience. Featuring the hit soundtrack with songs by Eric B. & Rakim, Boogie Down Productions, Guy, and Jay-Z.

programme.title: Harlem Nights, (1989, Comedy)
programme.desc: In the waning days of Prohibition, Sugar Ray and his adopted son, Quick, run a speakeasy called Club Sugar Ray. Gangster Bugsy Calhoune pays corrupt cop Phil Cantone to close Club Sugar Ray down.

programme.title: Witness, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: When a young Amish woman and her son get caught up in the murder of an undercover narcotic's agent, their saviour turns out to be hardened Philadelphia detective John Book.

programme.desc: This confrontation between good and evil stars Kevin Costner as federal agent Eliot Ness, Robert De Niro as gangland kingpin Al Capone, and Sean Connery as Malone, the cop who teaches Ness how to beat the mob: shoot fast and shoot first.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest, (1999, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Nearly twenty years after the cult TV show Galaxy Quest was cancelled, the alumni cast is asked for help by an alien species in order to save the universe.

programme.title: Stripes, (1981, Comedy)
programme.desc: Bill Murray has joined the Army, and the Army will never be the same! When John Winger (Murray) loses his job, his car, his apartment and his girlfriend, all in one day, he decides he only has one option: volunteer for Uncle Sam.

programme.title: Clerks II, (2006, Screwball)
programme.desc: A calamity at Dante and Randall's shops sends them looking for new horizons, but they ultimately settle at Mooby's, a fictional Disney-McDonald's-style fast-food empire. Sequel to the 1994 film by Kevin Smith.

programme.title: Clerks III, (2022, Screwball)
programme.desc: Following a massive heart attack, Randal enlists his friends and fellow clerks Dante, Elias, Jay, and Silent Bob to make a movie immortalizing his life at the convenience store that started it all.

programme.title: Good Burger, (1997, Comedy)
programme.desc: Kel are serving up laughs! They're the good guys in Good Burger, a zany comedy inspired by the popular Kel routine from Nickelodeon's hit series All That.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest, (1999, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Nearly twenty years after the cult TV show Galaxy Quest was cancelled, the alumni cast is asked for help by an alien species in order to save the universe.

programme.title: Emergency Declaration, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: After a terror incident occurs mid-flight, a passenger jet declares an emergency.

programme.title: The Boondock Saints, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: Two Irish Catholic brothers become vigilantes and wipe out Boston's criminal underworld in the name of God.

programme.title: The Boondock Saints, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: Two Irish Catholic brothers become vigilantes and wipe out Boston's criminal underworld in the name of God.

programme.title: Payback, (1999, Action)

programme.title: The Net, (1995, Drama)

programme.title: Double Jeopardy, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: Libby Parsons, who discovers that the husband she’s convicted of murdering staged his own “death” and framed her for the crime. Released on parole, she skips town to find him–and that puts parole officer Travis Lehman on her trail.

programme.title: Basic Instinct, (1992, Thriller)
programme.desc: San Francisco detective Nick Curran is investigating the murder of a once-celebrated rock star, and he's made a few unsettling discoveries: a bloody ice pick, a white silk scarf tied to a bedpost, and evidence of an otherwise romantic evening.

programme.title: Hit!, (1973, Action)
programme.desc: U.S. agent Nick Allen (Billy Dee Williams) has his own idea about how to fight a war on drugs: go to the source...and cut the big-time traffickers down. Embittered over the drug-related death of his teenage daughter, Nick sets out to do just that.

programme.title: Gator, (1976, Action)
programme.desc: The Feds want Gator McKlusky (Burt Reynolds) to go undercover to expose a local crime boss and former boyhood pal, Bama McCall. When Gator discovers Bama is involved in extortion, prostitution, and murder, the suspense builds to an explosive climax!

programme.title: Rockers, (1978, Documentary)
programme.desc: Night Flight Presents: Starring Leroy 'Horsemouth' Wallace and Richard 'Dirty Harry' Hall; ROCKERS is a story of oppressed Jamaican musicians getting even with the 'mafia types' in the business

programme.title: The Harder They Come, (1972, Action)
